channel.title: How do i create a database so
channel.description:
How do i create a database so when anyone goes to my website clicks login it checks to see if that username is there and the password is correct?
I'm using xampp and im pretty new to php. Believe me, any information anyone provides is help to me.
PHP is something I've been trying to look into, so if you have any recommended websites please dont hesitate to post them so I can look through it to learn a little bit.
Thanks in advance for any information!
